mapper.select: SELECT u.UserID, u.UserName, u.Email, u.birth, u.Password, d.DepartmentName, t.TeamName, u.ProfileImg, u.IsDelete, u.IsAdmin FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Departments d ON u.DepartmentID = d.DepartmentID LEFT JOIN Teams t ON u.TeamID = t.TeamID WHERE u.DepartmentID = #{departmentId}

SELECT u.UserID, u.UserName, u.Email, u.birth, u.Password, d.DepartmentName, t.TeamName, u.ProfileImg, u.IsDelete, u.IsAdmin FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Departments d ON u.DepartmentID = d.DepartmentID LEFT JOIN Teams t ON u.TeamID = t.TeamID WHERE u.UserID = #{UserID}
select DepartmentName from Departments where DepartmentID = #{param1};
select * from Teams where DepartmentID = #{param1};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Users (UserID, UserName, Email, birth, Password, DepartmentID, TeamID, ProfileImg, IsDelete, IsAdmin) VALUES (#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6}, #{param7}, null, false, false)
mapper.select: select DepartmentID from Users where UserId=#{param1}
select * from Users where DepartmentID=#{param1} and UserId!=#{param2}
select max(RoomID) from MeetingRooms where RoomManagerID=#{param1}

WITH RoomParticipation AS ( SELECT mr.RoomID, CASE WHEN MIN(COALESCE(sp.Status, 0)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ParticipationStatus FROM MeetingRooms mr LEFT JOIN StageParticipation sp ON mr.RoomID = sp.RoomID AND mr.StageID = sp.StageID AND sp.UserID = #{param1} WHERE mr.IsDelete = 0 AND mr.EndDate >= CURDATE() AND mr.StageID < 6 GROUP BY mr.RoomID ) SELECT mr.*, rp.ParticipationStatus, u.UserName AS RoomManagerName FROM MeetingRooms mr INNER JOIN MeetingRoomMembers mrm ON mr.RoomID = mrm.RoomID INNER JOIN RoomParticipation rp ON mr.RoomID = rp.RoomID LEFT JOIN Users u ON mr.RoomManagerID = u.UserID WHERE mr.IsDelete = 0 AND mrm.UserID = #{param1} AND mr.EndDate >= CURDATE() AND mr.StageID < 6 ORDER BY mr.RoomID DESC;
select * from Teams WHERE DepartmentID=#{param1}
SELECT mr.* from MeetingRooms mr inner join MeetingRoomMembers mrm on mr.RoomID = mrm.RoomID where mr.IsDelete = 0 and mrm.UserID = #{param1} order by mr.RoomID desc

SELECT u.*, d.DepartmentName, t.TeamName, COALESCE(m.TotalContribution, 0) as TotalContribution FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Departments d ON u.DepartmentID = d.DepartmentID LEFT JOIN Teams t ON u.TeamID = t.TeamID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT UserID, SUM(ContributionCnt) as TotalContribution FROM MeetingRoomMembers WHERE IsDelete = 0 GROUP BY UserID ) m ON u.UserID = m.UserID WHERE u.IsDelete = 0 AND u.UserID != 1 AND (u.UserName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR t.TeamName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%')) LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Teams t ON u.TeamID = t.TeamID WHERE u.IsDelete = 0 AND u.UserID != 1 AND (u.UserName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR t.TeamName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%'))
select DepartmentID from Users where UserId=#{param1}

SELECT mr.* FROM MeetingRooms mr INNER JOIN MeetingRoomMembers mrm ON mr.RoomID = mrm.RoomID WHERE mr.IsDelete = 0 AND mrm.UserID = #{userId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN mr.StageID = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, mr.RoomID DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT mr.RoomID) FROM MeetingRooms mr INNER JOIN MeetingRoomMembers mrm ON mr.RoomID = mrm.RoomID WHERE mr.IsDelete = 0 AND mrm.UserID = #{userId}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MIN(t.endTime), '%Y.%m.%d') AS dueDate, mr.RoomTitle, mr.StageID, mr.RoomID, s.Status AS stageStatus FROM Timer t JOIN MeetingRooms mr ON t.RoomID = mr.RoomID JOIN Stages s ON mr.StageID = s.StageID JOIN StageParticipation sp ON mr.RoomID = sp.RoomID AND mr.StageID = sp.StageID WHERE sp.UserID = #{userId} AND sp.Status = 0 AND DATE(t.endTime) = CURDATE() AND t.endTime > NOW() -- 현재 시간 이후의 항목만 선택 GROUP BY mr.RoomID, mr.StageID ORDER BY MIN(t.endTime) ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MIN(t.endTime), '%Y.%m.%d') AS dueDate, mr.RoomTitle, mr.StageID, mr.RoomID, s.Status AS stageStatus FROM Timer t JOIN MeetingRooms mr ON t.RoomID = mr.RoomID JOIN Stages s ON mr.StageID = s.StageID JOIN StageParticipation sp ON mr.RoomID = sp.RoomID AND mr.StageID = sp.StageID WHERE sp.UserID = #{userId} AND sp.Status = 0 AND DATE(t.endTime) = #{date} AND t.endTime > NOW() -- 현재 시간 이후의 항목만 선택 GROUP BY mr.RoomID, mr.StageID, mr.RoomTitle, s.Status ORDER BY MIN(t.endTime) ASC

SELECT mr.RoomID, mr.RoomTitle, mrm.ContributionCnt FROM MeetingRooms mr JOIN MeetingRoomMembers mrm ON mr.RoomID = mrm.RoomID WHERE mrm.UserID = #{userId} AND mr.IsDelete = 0 AND mrm.IsDelete = 0 ORDER BY mrm.ContributionCnt DESC

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN mr.StageID < 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ongoing_meetings, SUM(CASE WHEN mr.StageID >= 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed_meetings, COUNT(*) as total_meetings, COALESCE(SUM(mrm.ContributionCnt), 0) as total_contribution FROM MeetingRooms mr JOIN MeetingRoomMembers mrm ON mr.RoomID = mrm.RoomID WHERE mrm.UserID = #{userId} AND mr.IsDelete = 0 AND mrm.IsDelete = 0
